name: fso-phonebook
description: Phonebook back end exercise for Full Stack Open 2020 course

scripts.build:ui: rm -rf build && cd ../full-stack-open/part-2/phonebook && npm run build --prod && cp -r build ../../../fso-phonebook
scripts.deploy:full: npm run build:ui && git add . && git commit -m Update build && npm run deploy

author: anmarp
